'''''Hey! Calm Down!''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] in [[Natlan]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of volatile tribal warriors are searching for sparring partners in the wild, posing a threat to the safety of the surrounding areas. Go confront them and calm them down.}}
# Defeat all the tribal warriors (0/5)
